Rescue in the Jungle! Help Mia fly the helicopter and Matthew drive the Jeep and radio her about a bear cub stranded on a rickety bridge over the river!
Box/Instructions:
New Jungle graphics, such as one green flange, one purple -- both outlined in Bamboo. It also shows actions scenes on the box back.
column2: Two instruction booklets and 3 bags of bricks/elements, plus on 8x16 baseplate in Medium Azure are included.

column1: Overall opinion:

For fans who want a bit more action, this is a perfect set. The Jungle setting may be more attractive to the adventurous type of fan, yet most Friends fans like their Animals -- and rescuing one can be hard to resist.
